title: Eat The Elephant
lyrics:
Looming, omnipresent
This task ahead
This task at hand
Ominous and daunting
Crippling undertaking, I'm frozen

Where to begin eludes me

Without you to remind me



Just take the step

Just take the swing

Just take the bite

Just go all in



Where to begin eludes me

Ruling ever deeper

This massive endeavor

Ominous and daunting

Crippling undertaking



Just take the step

Just take the swing

Just take the bite

Just go all in



Take the step

Take the swing

Take the bite

Just take the bite



Take the step

Take the swing

Take the bite

Just go all in



Where to begin eludes me

Without you to remind me

Just begin
